PHRASE.LANG: Part of the elusive eternal skull collection, this Onyx skull is as luxurious as it is dreaded. [#Legal]
Ce crâne en onyx est aussi luxueux que redouté. Il fait partie de la collection insaisissable de crânes éternels. [#Legal]
Dieser Onyxschädel ist Teil der unfassbaren, ewigen Schädelkollektion. Er ist so luxuriös wie gefürchtet. [#Legal]
Parte della sfuggente collezione di teschi eterni, questo teschio di onice è tanto lussuoso quanto temuto. [#Legal]
Esta calavera de ónice, tan lujosa como aterradora, forma parte de la ansiada colección Calavera eterna. [#Legal]
찾기 어려운 영원의 해골 콜렉션 중 일부로, 이 오닉스 해골은 사람들이 두려워하는 만큼 호화롭습니다.[#Legal]
Part of the elusive eternal skull collection, this Onyx skull is as luxurious as it is dreaded. [#Legal]
永恆骷髏頭系列之一。這個瑪瑙石骷髏頭固然可怕，也同樣名貴。 [#Legal]
